EmailTemplate.description: Send from Training Event to any one assigned a Learning Plan Phase II that hasn't completed within 30 days.
EmailTemplate.name: Learning Plan Completion Reminder Phase II Corp Payments
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Learning Plan Misses You!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your Learning Plan is Waiting!
Hi ,
I'm just checking in to see how you're doing on completing your Learning Plan Phase II Corporate Payments (https://wexinc.my.salesforce.com/sfc/p/700000009EOI/a/0g000000H2uy/fCkk0cnJjPFHlaRXStOhMDxKCdTRNlcP0gpb1Q5odnA).
Once you've fully reviewed the Learning Plan, take the Knowledge Check (https://forms.gle/hRLqTVZSnL1uvVj57) to indicate that you've completed this training.
Please let me know any if you have any questions.
Thank You,
{!User.Name} WEX University Global Training
